CREATE TABLE ###page ( page_id smallint NOT NULL, name character varying(255) NOT NULL, slug character varying(255) NOT NULL, description text NOT NULL, content text NOT NULL, left_id integer NOT NULL, right_id integer NOT NULL, parent_id integer NOT NULL, num_views integer DEFAULT 0, created_date time without time zone DEFAULT NULL, modified_date time without time zone DEFAULT NULL, user_id integer DEFAULT NULL, language character varying(10) DEFAULT NULL::character varying ); CREATE SEQUENCE page_page_id_seq START WITH 1 INCREMENT BY 1 NO MAXVALUE NO MINVALUE CACHE 1; ALTER SEQUENCE page_page_id_seq OWNED BY ###page.page_id; SELECT pg_catalog.setval('page_page_id_seq', 1, false);
